name: Fishy Food
description:
The fish are hungry, but some food is poisoned!
Are you clever enough to eat all except the deadly item?
Can you solve the screenshot levels above?

*dramatic voice*
"Click on food to feed the fish,
but DON'T click the poisoned dish.
You MUST consider ALL the clues,
or YOU – and one sad fish – will lose!"

*less dramatic voice*
Features:
- 180 challenging levels
- Infinite replayability, levels are different every time.
- No in-app purchases
